attributes.action: Award Sid Wadell with an MBE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sid Wadell, a sports commentator. Not just any sports commentator, a true great. Sids unique grasp of the english language coupled with his off beat historical references has made his voice and his comments an incredible addition to television armchair sports watching. There are many in this slightly left field position, Stuart Hall, John Gwynne, Dave Lanning. All of them artists in their chosen arena, wordsmiths that have brought humour and fun to their commentary. Sid is a special talent and this country needs to recognise this.

rejection.details: There is a formal system for nominating honours at http://www.honours.gov.uk
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
